column4: hey, what plugin do i need to play kvcd files in Movie Player?
i don't think that you need a plugin for kvcd seeing that kvcd movies are essentially mpeg files.  Can you play kvcd files in movie player (totem btw) at the moment?
i'd just use VLC but it's not letting me go fullscreen...
do you know how to get into full screen using VLC?
i used it for months, now when i double-click or go to view>>fullscreen it just maximises the window
it says i need a VCD plugin for totem to play the kvcd file
the version in the feisty repos
um, look at http://www.videohelp.com/forum/archive/mvcd-kvcd-t286448.html.  that might help
apparently kvcd files will play fine in VLC.  I really don't know
i already know they do - it just won't fullscreen
eh, try the forums.  it could be because that kvcd is a non standard video (just chucking in a random guess)
just about to look at ur forum post
seeing that ur sata drive works in ubuntu, it's a software issue, but what it is i dunno...
